search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Fireflies.ai (fireflies.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Fireflies.ai is available at: [https://fireflies.ai/pricing](https://fireflies.ai/pricing)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
![Image 1](https://fireflies.ai/website/assets/_next/image?url=%2Fwebsite%2Fassets%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fcomets-background.9e876e97.svg&w=3840&q=75)

Supercharge Your Meetings
-------------------------

Flexible plans for teams of all sizes. Upgrade to get unlimited transcripts, summaries, and video recordings.

Monthly

Annual

Save up to 44%

Free

For individuals starting out

$0$0

Free forever

[Get Started](https://app.fireflies.ai/plan?ref=free&utm_content=pricing_hero)

*   Unlimited transcription\*
    
*   Limited AI summaries
    
*   800 mins of storage/seat
    

Key Features

*   Zoom, GMeet, Teams, [+more](https://fireflies.ai/integrations/videoconferencing)
    
*   Transcription in 100+ languages
    
*   Meeting search
    
*   AskFred: AI assistant
    
*   Upload audio/video file
    
*   Mobile app ([Android](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=ai.fireflies.mobile&utm_source=landing&pli=1), [iOS](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/fireflies-ai-notetaker/id6463164203?utm_source=landing))
    
*   [Chrome extension](https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/fireflies-ai-meeting-note/meimoidfecamngeoanhnpdjjdcefoldn?utm_source=landing)
    

Pro

For professional individuals and small teams

$18$10

per seat / month, billed annually

[Get Started](https://app.fireflies.ai/plan?ref=pro&utm_content=pricing_hero)

*   Unlimited transcription
    
*   Unlimited AI summaries
    
*   8,000 mins of storage/seat
    

Everything in Free, plus..

*   Download transcripts, summaries, recordings
    
*   Talk-time analytics
    
*   AI Apps
    
*   Action Items & Task Manager
    
*   Unlimited integrations
    

[Rate Limits](https://guide.fireflies.ai/hc/en-us/articles/360020248558-Learn-about-transcription-credits-storage-and-rate-limits-for-meetings)

MOST POPULAR

Business

For fast growing businesses

$29$19

per seat / month, billed annually

[Get Started](https://app.fireflies.ai/plan?ref=business&utm_content=pricing_hero)

*   Unlimited transcription
    
*   Unlimited AI summaries
    
*   Unlimited storage
    

Everything in Pro, plus..

*   Video recording
    
*   Conversation intelligence
    
*   Team analytics (for admins)
    
*   User groups
    
*   API access
    

[Rate Limits](https://guide.fireflies.ai/hc/en-us/articles/360020248558-Learn-about-transcription-credits-storage-and-rate-limits-for-meetings)

Enterprise

For large scale enterprises

$39$39

per seat / month, billed annually

[Contact Us](https://fireflies.ai/enterprise)

*   Unlimited transcription
    
*   Unlimited AI summaries
    
*   Unlimited storage
    

Everything in Business, plus..

*   Rules engine
    
*   SSO
    
*   HIPAA compliance
    
*   Private storage

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

Still have more questions? Please write to [\[email protected\]](https://fireflies.ai/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#a1d2d4d1d1ced3d5e1c7c8d3c4c7cdc8c4d28fc0c8) and we will respond as quickly as we can.

Don’t Take Our Word For it
--------------------------

See why thousands of organizations are switching to Fireflies

“Fireflies brought more structure in our meetings and more transparency within our company.”

“Impressed by Fireflies’ analytics. It helps tracks my team conversations.”

“Fireflies cuts down on additional calls with customers, letting us focus directly on solutions.”

“Super impressed with how Fireflies helps us analyze what our customers actually need!”

Get more out of your meetings

![Image 11: Transcript](https://fireflies.ai/website/assets/_next/image?url=%2Fwebsite%2Fassets%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Ffeatures-transcript.1100eef5.png&w=3840&q=75)

![Image 12: AI Summaries](https://fireflies.ai/website/assets/_next/image?url=%2Fwebsite%2Fassets%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Ffeatures-ai-summaries.712b8ba6.png&w=3840&q=75)

![Image 13: AskFred](https://fireflies.ai/website/assets/_next/image?url=%2Fwebsite%2Fassets%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Ffeatures-ask-fred.85cd94d0.png&w=3840&q=75)

![Image 14: Meeting Search](https://fireflies.ai/website/assets/_next/image?url=%2Fwebsite%2Fassets%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Ffeatures-search.ca1d7781.png&w=3840&q=75)

![Image 15: Track Key Topics](https://fireflies.ai/website/assets/_next/image?url=%2Fwebsite%2Fassets%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Ffeatures-topic-tracker.78a21f26.png&w=3840&q=75)

![Image 16: Time-Stamped Comments](https://fireflies.ai/website/assets/_next/image?url=%2Fwebsite%2Fassets%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Ffeatures-comments.5a768d4c.png&w=3840&q=75)

![Image 17: AI Filters](https://fireflies.ai/website/assets/_next/image?url=%2Fwebsite%2Fassets%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Ffeatures-ai-filters.35ed4a4f.png&w=3840&q=75)

![Image 18: Share Meetings](https://fireflies.ai/website/assets/_next/image?url=%2Fwebsite%2Fassets%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Ffeatures-share-meeting.239328f9.png&w=3840&q=75)

Enterprise-grade Security
-------------------------

Fireflies is the preferred platform for CIOs across the Fortune 500, offering robust admin controls and stringent security protocols.

[Get Started](https://app.fireflies.ai/login)

![Image 19: SOC Type II](https://fireflies.ai/website/assets/_next/image?url=%2Fwebsite%2Fassets%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fsoc-2.4a484aac.png&w=96&q=75)

### SOC Type II

Fireflies follows industry standards for data security, privacy, and confidentiality.

![Image 20: GDPR](https://fireflies.ai/website/assets/_next/image?url=%2Fwebsite%2Fassets%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fgdpr.280cc9c0.png&w=96&q=75)

### GDPR

Rigorous data protection and privacy standards in line with European regulations.

![Image 21: HIPAA Compliant](https://fireflies.ai/website/assets/_next/image?url=%2Fwebsite%2Fassets%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fhipaa.b3d9c2b6.png&w=96&q=75)

### HIPAA Compliant

Complete protection for healthcare organizations.

### BAA

Complete protection of PHI with business associate agreement.

### Private Storage

Secure, dedicated cloud storage exclusively for your organization’s data.

### End-to-End Encrypted

All your meeting data is protected with 256-bit AES and SSL/TLS encryption.

Fireflies uses generative AI to bring ChatGPT to meetings. Generate transcripts and smart summaries for Zoom, Google Meet, Microsoft Teams, Webex and several other platforms.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Annual plans offer discounts compared to monthly billing.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: For professional individuals and small teams
